SELECT count(*) as count FROM tb_board a, tb_member b WHERE a.bo_writer = b.mem_id AND a.bo_del_yn = 'N'
AND a.bo_title LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND a.bo_content LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND (a.bo_content LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR a.bo_title LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%')
AND b.mem_name = #{searchWord}
ORDER BY a.bo_seq_no DESC

SELECT a.bo_seq_no , a.bo_type , a.bo_title , a.bo_content , a.bo_writer , b.mem_name as bo_writer_name , a.bo_hit_cnt , a.bo_open_yn , a.bo_del_yn , a.reg_user , a.reg_date , a.upd_user , a.upd_date FROM tb_board a, tb_member b WHERE a.bo_writer = b.mem_id AND a.bo_del_yn = 'N'
AND a.bo_title LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND a.bo_content LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND (a.bo_content LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR a.bo_title LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%')
AND b.mem_name = #{searchWord}
ORDER BY bo_seq_no DESC

SELECT a.bo_seq_no , a.bo_type , a.bo_title , a.bo_content , a.bo_writer , (SELECT b.mem_name FROM tb_member b WHERE a.bo_writer = b.mem_id) as bo_writer_name , a.bo_hit_cnt , a.bo_open_yn , a.bo_del_yn , a.reg_user , a.reg_date , a.upd_user , a.upd_date FROM tb_board a WHERE a.bo_del_yn = 'N' AND a.bo_seq_no = #{bo_seq_no}
